external_references.description: Schroeder, W., Warner, J., Nelson, M. (n.d.). Github PowerShellEmpire. Retrieved April 28, 2016.

description: [Empire](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0363) can enumerate Security Support Providers (SSPs) as well as utilize [PowerSploit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0194)'s Install-SSP and Invoke-Mimikatz to install malicious SSPs and log authentication events.(Citation: Github PowerShell Empire)
